It is not important which project bring us global decentralization if at least one succeed. There might be more winners and it is fine.  #Cardano will be scalable and programmable. Despite the main-net is not launched yet, it is closer than all existing projects.  $ada $btc $eth  https://t.co/FfyD7L6FaB

Not all Cardano nodes see all other nodes at all times. The way the protocol works is that some nodes see some nodes, and others see others and their territories overlap. My lists are NOT complete. That is how decentralized works. See this link for details  https://t.co/FNwQjVq5Wz  https://t.co/r5XrT1g4LH

#Cardano's overall focus beyond a particular set of innovations is to provide a more balanced and sustainable ecosystem that better accounts for the needs of its users as well as other systems seeking integration.   See the motivation list. It is still valid.  $ada $btc $eth $xrp  https://t.co/XvJ4QfsDDn

Legacy financial systems are rich in transactional metadata and regulators often require them. Making no accommodation for actors who want to voluntarily include these fields seems counterproductive to mainstream adoption. #Cardano will be compliant.  #blockchain $ada $eth $btc  https://t.co/tup2QYkDcf

@Cardanians_io @haskellcoding29 Certain versions of #Ouroboros (i.e. BFT) are not vulnerable to long-range and stake-bleeding.
